name: @just-every/code
description: Lightweight coding agent that runs in your terminal - fork of OpenAI Codex

scripts.prepublishOnly: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const repoGit=path.join(__dirname,'..','.git'); const inCi=process.env.GITHUB_ACTIONS==='true'||process.env.CI==='true'; if(fs.existsSync(repoGit) && !inCi){ console.error('Refusing to publish from codex-cli. Use codex-cli/scripts/stage_release.sh to stage a release.'); process.exit(1);} else { console.log(inCi ? 'CI publish detected.' : 'Publishing staged package...'); }"
